mapper.select: SELECT R.REVIEW_NUMBER, R.REVIEW_CONTENT, R.REVIEW_REGISTER_DATE, R.REVIEW_UPDATE_DATE, R.PARENT_NUMBER, R.CLASS_NUMBER FROM ( SELECT * FROM PRO P JOIN CLASS C ON P.PRO_NUMBER = C.PRO_NUMBER AND P.PRO_NUMBER = #{proNumber} ) DETAIL JOIN REVIEW R ON DETAIL.CLASS_NUMBER = R.CLASS_NUMBER;

SELECT pr.PRO_REPORT_NUMBER, pr.PRO_REPORT_CONTENT, pr.PRO_REPORT_REGISTER_DATE, pr.PRO_POST_NUMBER, pp.PRO_NUMBER, pp.PRO_POST_TITLE FROM pro_report pr LEFT JOIN pro_post pp ON pr.PRO_POST_NUMBER = pp.PRO_POST_NUMBER WHERE pp.PRO_NUMBER = #{proNumber}
